author: Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D., Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D.
title: Sicilian Mayor Says Obey Lockdown or You Will Be Guilty of ‘Mass Murder’
description: The mayor of Palermo, Leoluca Orlando, has released a video message warning citizens to stay in their homes during the coronavirus lockdown or they will be responsible for “mass murder.”
content:
ROME The mayor of Palermo, Leoluca Orlando, has released a video message warning citizens to stay in their homes during the coronavirus lockdown or they will be responsible for mass murder.
The Minister of the Interior corrected the decree by specifying that… [+2292 chars]
